Method.name: ClearEpisodes
Method.Description: Оставить по 10 эпизодов в каждом месяце (наиболее заполненных)
Method.Implementation:
set limit=20 kill ^||vsp kill counter set epis="" for { set epis=$order(^TEPI(epis),1,rec) if epis="" quit set date=$piece(rec,"\",8) if date="" continue set mounth=$e($tr($zd(date,3),"-",""),1,6) set fio=$piece(rec,"\",1) set doctor=$piece(rec,"\",13) set hosp=$p(rec,"\",20) set age=$p(rec,"\",25)
set coef=0 if fio'="" set coef=coef+1 if doctor'="" set coef=coef+1 if hosp'="" set coef=coef+1 if age'="" set coef=coef+1 set ts="" for { set ts=$order(^TEPI(epis,1,ts)) if ts="" quit set tscnt="" for { set tscnt=$order(^TEPI(epis,1,ts,tscnt),1,rects) if tscnt="" quit //set device=$p(rects,"\",27) //if device'="" set coef=coef+1 set dateauth=$p(rects,"\",4) if dateauth'="" set coef=coef+1 set userauth=$p(rects,"\",6) if userauth'="" set coef=coef+1 set datecollect=$p(rects,"\",44) if datecollect'="" set coef=coef+1 set test="",devicecount=0 for { set test=$order(^TEPI(epis,1,ts,tscnt,"DATA",test),1,rectest) if test="" quit set device=$p(rectest,"\",6) if device'="" set devicecount=devicecount+1 } if devicecount>0 set coef=coef+1 } } set ^||vsp(mounth,coef,epis)="" } kill ^||nokill set mounth="" for { set mounth=$order(^||vsp(mounth)) if mounth="" quit set coef="" for { set coef=$order(^||vsp(mounth,coef)) if coef="" quit if +$get(counter(mounth))'<limit quit set epis="" for { set epis=$order(^||vsp(mounth,coef,epis)) if epis="" quit if +$get(counter(mounth))>9 quit set ^||nokill(epis)=mounth set counter(mounth)=$get(counter(mounth))+1 } } } b set epis="" for { set epis=$order(^TEPI(epis),1,rec) if epis="" quit if $data(^||nokill(epis)) continue kill ^TEPI(epis) }
